actions.detail: You generate a Blast 2 zone of distorted timeflow within SENSORS and line of sight that affects all characters other than you. Characters within the affected area cannot take reactions, and if they start their turn within it, they must succeed on a Systems save or take 2 Heat and become Slowed until the end of their next turn. This effect lasts until this action is taken again or the scene ends.
actions.name: Wandering Nightmare
